attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Especially in rural areas, local post offices are vital for old people who are restricted in outside contact, and important part of village communities. When one closes, up to 500 villagers have to get in their cars and drive causing more pollution and traffic on already overstretched roads. Taxpayers wouldn't mind paying more, it's not as if our money would be refunded when P.O.s closed down.

rejection.details: Please ammend the main sentence to give an explicit action for HM Government.
reasons: Statements that don't actually request any action
